# scale

**Instance Property**

The intensity of the clearcoat.

## Declaration

```swift
var scale: Float
```

## Discussion

Use the scale value either to hold a uniform clearcoat value that applies to the entire entity, or use it as a multiplier to scale the clearcoat intensity sampled from the [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/CustomMaterial/Clearcoat-swift.struct/texture] property.

## Accessing clearcoat values

- **texture**: The clearcoat intensity specified using a UV-mapped image.
